name: In The Soup
description:
In The Soup 0.1

You are the soup-master and this is your soup! Where did all these slimes come from? They must be hungry.

How To Play:

Press any key to start! Gather vegetables for your soup. Use WASD to move and left-click to swing your spoon. Aim using the mouse and use left-click to throw. Zoom with the mouse wheel or with page-up and page-down. Press backspace to restart. Try to collect at least 60 vegetables!

Future Development:

Multiplayer! Several distinct characters with specific roles! Highly cooperative gameplay! A full kitchen, with walls! More ingredients! More danger! More chaos! More soup!!!
